name: 服務品質管理研究
description:
This course focuses on emerging theoretical, conceptual and methodological perspectives in service management. By the end of the course, the PhD candidate will be equipped in: 
1) The theoretical foundations and the emergence of the service research discipline; 
2) Past and current research questions in service management
3) Methodologies on how to address service research problems
goals: 論證人力資源、服務品質、與顧客體驗的關係
比較並評論服務品質模型與理論
論證服務品質、失誤補救、與回饋機制的相關研究與方法論
創作服務品質管理的研究計畫案
syllabus:
1\. Course introduction, Reading assignments

2\. Studies of Service and Service quality (SQ)

3~4. SQ models and measurements

5~6. SQ perceptions and antecedents

7\. Guest speaker

8\. Satisfaction vs. Dissatisfaction

9\. service and customer experiences

10~12. Service delivery and Service guaranty

13\. Service failure, Recovery, and Feedback mechanism

14\. Service marketing and CRM

15\. Guest speaker

16\. Review session

17~18. Final project presentations

grading.note: 包括書面記錄和MOODLE平台討論與回應
